description: The royal palace of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fish-Man Island, home to King Neptune and the royal family. A grand structure that hosts important state events and celebrations.

keyEvents.title: Grand Banquet at Ryugu Palace
keyEvents.description: King Neptune hosts a grand celebration banquet to honor the Straw Hat Pirates for saving Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the gratitude of the Ryugu Kingdom and provides the setting for crucial revelations about ancient history.

keyEvents.title: Robin and Neptune Discuss Joy Boy
keyEvents.description: Robin privately questions Neptune about Joy Boy and the ancient history of Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: The palace serves as the location where crucial information about the Void Century and ancient weapons is revealed.

keyEvents.title: Shirahoshi Revealed as Poseidon
keyEvents.description: Robin deduces and Neptune confirms that Shirahoshi is the ancient weapon Poseidon.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most important revelations in the series occurs at this location.

statusHistory.reason: Royal palace remains the seat of power for the Ryugu Kingdom

description: An underwater island located 10,000 meters below sea level, serving as an underwater paradise and the gateway to the New World. Home to both Fish-Men and Merfolk, protected by a massive bubble.

keyEvents.title: Fish-Man Island Victory Celebration
keyEvents.description: The entire island celebrates the defeat of Hody Jones and the New Fish-Man Pirates by the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the immediate threat and establishes the Straw Hats as heroes among the Fish-Men and Merfolk.

keyEvents.title: Ancient Weapon Poseidon's Location Confirmed
keyEvents.description: Robin confirms that the ancient weapon Poseidon mentioned in the Skypiea poneglyph is located on Fish-Man Island in the form of Shirahoshi.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Fish-Man Island as the home of one of the three ancient weapons.

statusHistory.reason: Island remains inhabited and protected after the defeat of Hody Jones

description: A lawless slum district on Fish-Man Island where orphaned Fish-Men grew up in poverty and hatred. Former stronghold of the New Fish-Man Pirates and breeding ground for anti-human sentiment.

keyEvents.title: Fish-Man District Permanently Sealed
keyEvents.description: Neptune's forces permanently seal off the Fish-Man District to prevent future conflicts and end the cycle of hatred that bred there.
keyEvents.significance: Represents a symbolic end to the cycle of hatred and discrimination that led to the rise of Arlong and Hody Jones.

statusHistory.reason: Lawless district where the New Fish-Man Pirates operated
Permanently sealed by Neptune after the defeat of the New Fish-Man Pirates
